speech.original_text: सुप्रभात मिट्रों मेरा नाम अग्रिमाश्र्वास्तव है और आज मैं आप सब को जीवन के विश्यमे कुछ महत्वपून सीख देना चाती हूं.
speech.text: My name is Progressive and today I want to teach you all some important things in life.
speech.translation_llm: Progressive is my name and today I aim to impart some vital insights into life to all of you.

speech.original_text: मेरे बगल में मेरे भ्राता श्री आकर्छ्र्वास्तव बैटे हैं जो आपको इस विश्यमे और बता हीं.
speech.text: In my side there are my brothers, Mr. Akhrvastov Bate, who will tell you this wisely and more.
speech.translation_llm: My brothers, Mr. Akhrvastov Bate, are with me and they will provide you with wise and additional information.

speech.original_text: प्रणाम दोस्तों मेरा नाम आकर्छ्र्वास्तव है और मैं अपने बगल में बैटे ही पागल बैन का ब्राता श्री हूं उसकी भाशा में.
speech.text: System friends My name is Ackhrust and I am the brother of the crazy Ben in his brotherhood.
speech.translation_llm: Ackhrust is the brother of Ben, who is known for his wild behavior.

speech.original_text: और मुझे पता नहीं मैं क्या बोलूं तो अभी 10.30 बचने में कुछ 23 मिन्ट बचे हुए हैं.
speech.text: And I don't know what I'm going to say so there's just a few 23 minutes left to escape.
speech.translation_llm: I'm unsure of what I'm going to say, so there are only a few minutes left to escape.

speech.original_text: मुझे यह जानकर अच्छम्हित होना पर रहा है कि इसने कितनी शीद्र यह अनुमान लगा लिया कि 10.30 बचने में मातर 23 मिन्ट बचे हैं.
speech.text: I was happy to know how much it had predicted that at 10.30 there were 23 minutes left to escape.
speech.translation_llm: I was pleased to learn that at 10.30, there were 23 minutes left to escape, as it had predicted.

speech.original_text: और अब मुझे कितनी देर और बोलना हैं मुझे पता नहीं.
speech.text: I don’t know how long I have to talk.
speech.translation_llm: I am unsure of how long I have to speak.

speech.original_text: इतना बोलना हैं मुझे लगता है कि काफी होगा इतने में हमें पता चल जाएगा कि यह क्या होने वाला हैं.
speech.text: So much to talk I think it will be enough so we’ll know what it’s going to happen.
speech.translation_llm: I believe that there is enough information to determine what will happen, as there is a lot to talk about.
